remarks: Closure for a difference quotient.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvlem.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : D --> CC ) $.
dvlem.2 $e |- ( ph -> D C_ CC ) $.
dvlem.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. D ) $.
dvlem $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( D \ { B } ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` A ) - ( F ` B ) ) / ( A - B ) ) e. CC ) $.
